alert.note: Alert for Clay (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 13 at 6:42AM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota... South Branch Buffalo River at Sabin affecting Clay County. Buffalo River near Dilworth affecting Clay County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Buffalo River near Hawley affecting Clay County. .Temperatures remained above freezing overnight, so snowmelt and runoff continued as well. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...South Branch Buffalo River at Sabin. * WHEN...From this afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, MODERATE FLOOD STAGE. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 12.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 15.5 feet Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
